title: Meow Ears Up
overview: The story is about a comic artist who grew up in an orphanage and, the only "warm and happy feelings" he knows is through the letter. Dermdem saw a stray cat and took the cat home with him, but one day, that cat turned into a human. He's from the "ear tribe". Meow had changed Dermdem's boring life to chaos, but in that chaos, Dermdem got to learn the true meaning of life and finally felt the feeling of warmth and happiness.
